item.description:
The swamptones is playing at Oscar Pinatas.  Don't remember the Swamptones?  The Swamptones is the blues/Jazz band that was playing at Alpha Farm the day of the wine tasting.  For those who did not attend the wine tasting, The Swamptones was a really good Jazz/Blues band, a few members have requested to see again.

Oscar Pinata's is a mexican restaurant.  So lets go out have some authentic Mexican food at 7pm, then listen to the cool music of the Swamptones at 8:00pm.

 

Please make sure you have the meetup cell number with you, so that you can call if you are running late, lost or have to cancel at the last minute.  The phone number is 978-304-2811.

If you sign up for this meetup, but then your plans change, please ensure you go into the website to change your rsvp.  Having no shows at a restaurant that we have made reservations at, is not only bad for the group but could mean a loss of income for the restaurant.

 

Hope to see you there

Donna & Janet
item.name: The Swamptones @ Oscar Pinatas
